Package org.forgerock.openidm.repo

Interface RepositoryService

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCRepoService, OrientDBRepoService
public interface RepositoryService
Common OpenIDM repository interface This service should only be used in when a direct interface to the repository is absolutely necessary and making the same requests over the router is not an option. This interface should not be used if the request should be accompanied by a Context.

  • Method Details

    • create

      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse create(org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest request) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
      Creates a new resource in the repository.
      Parameters:
      request - the create request
      Returns:
      the created resource
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - if an error was encountered during creation

    • read

      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse read(org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest request) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
      Reads a resource from the repository based on the supplied read request.
      Parameters:
      request - the read request.
      Returns:
      the requested resource.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - if an error was encountered during the read.

    • update

      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse update(org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest request) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
      Updates a resource in the repository

      This implementation requires MVCC and hence enforces that clients state what revision they expect to be updating

      If successful, this method updates metadata properties within the passed object, including: a new _rev value for the revised object's version

      Parameters:
      request - the update request
      Returns:
      the updated resource
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - if an error was encountered while updating

    • delete

      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse delete(org.forgerock.json.resource.DeleteRequest request) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
      Deletes a new resource in the repository.
      Parameters:
      request - the delete request
      Returns:
      an empty resource
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - if an error was encountered during the delete

    • query

      List<org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse> query(org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest request) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
      Queries resources in the repository. Must provide built in query support for queryid query-all-ids.
      Parameters:
      request - the query request
      Returns:
      a list containing the query results
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - if an error was encountered during query
